title: how do  the 30 token missions work?
body: right now i am at 140 because i missed the first day of the event. however i noticed that for the first two missions i was able to get 30 tokens for completing my missions and started to get 20 after that. i calculated that if i can get another  2 days with 30 tokens i will have exactly enough for the dawn bringer icon and  border, but some people on the forums have mentioned that they only get 20  per day and haven't received 30 tokens at all. i also noticed that when i got the 30 tokens, it was during the weekend. so i am wondering if getting the 30 tokens is a weekend exclusive thing or if it is just  only for the first few missions. any help from a rioter would be appreciated. thanks! ;)

replies.body: The reward will depend on the mission and if you have a pass.  For example, pass holders will get bonus tokens and have access to more missions (novice and master) than just the main path.  Let me know if that clears things up!

i didnt spend rp on any passes or any token  but the first two missions i did  gave me 30 tokens, 10 for completing the first quest, and 20  for the secondary quest for the day. however im not sure if it was only because i missed the first day of the event or if it was just only for those missions.
